story: Today is my birthday. I am going to have a big birthday party with my friends. I am looking forward to it, and I feel very …
Today, I am going to the aquarium with my sister. I look forward to seeing so many water animals. I feel very….
Today I will go to the cinema to watch my favorite cartoon. I feel very……
Today my mom took me to the playground and bought me my favorite ice cream. I felt very ...
Today my brother read two of my favorite books to me. I love my brother, and I felt very ….
Today I visited my grandparents and swam in the lake with them. I felt very …
Today my sister took my toy without asking me first. I was feeling very….
Today my friend pushed me on purpose, and I fell to the ground. She didn't say “I am sorry”; she just walked away. I was feeling very…
Today my mom and I went to the park. I started playing with my friends, but my mom told me that I had to go home, and I didn't want to go home. I was feeling very….
Today my friend asked me for my dad's name. I said the name 5 times, and he didn’t get it. After multiple attempts, I felt very …..
Today I went to the playground with my mom. My mom bought me an ice cream, and I accidentally dropped it on the ground. I was feeling very…
Today I was doing a puzzle in my class when my friend came and stepped on it and ruined it. I was feeling very…
Today I went to the aquarium, and I saw a Jellyfish. My friend told me that it was an Octopus. I was feeling very…
Yesterday I climbed up Climbers, and I went so high. When I reached the highest part, I didn’t know if I should come down because I thought I might fall. I was feeling …
Today I went to school, and I saw a huge insect crawling on the doorstep. I got really scared, and I felt very …
My friend and I poked a bumble bee today, and the bumble bee started chasing us. We were running so fast. I was feeling very …
Today I raced with my friend, and we did many rounds. My friend asked me if I wanted to go and climb, but I told my friend - "I need to breathe and rest first". I was feeling very …
Today I didn't sleep too much, I woke up very early, and I couldn't have a nap. At the end of the day, I was feeling very….
Today was very hot outside. I walked a long distance till I arrived at my home. I was feeling very…
Today my dad offered to help me put on my shoes, but I told my dad that I don't need help, I can put them on by myself. I was feeling very…

Today I returned from school, washed my hands, and ate lunch. After finishing, I saw my mom folding clothes, and I asked her to teach me how to fold clothes. She taught me, and I could do it all by myself. I was feeling very…
Today I brushed my teeth all by myself. I brushed them everywhere, and I made sure there was no food left. It was my first time to do it by myself, and I felt so …
